titleStmt.title: The printers case humbly submitted to the consideration of the Honourable the House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: The second leaf has drop-head title: 'The printers proposals for a regulation of the press.', and docket title: 'The printers case: with their proposals for regulating the press.' (Wing (2nd ed.) P3506).
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
"The printers proposals ..." was not issued separately. Cf. ESTC.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library, London.
